These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.
Do you want to let members use(earn,spend,etc) credits?
Do you want to let members to transfer(send) credits?
Set the max number of credits which can be sent
Set the max number of credits which can be received
Below you browse members and view their credits balance, total earned and spent credits amount, edit their credit balance, etc. Please use the form below to find the member by Display Name.
Below you can edit the number of total earned, total spent credits and credit balance. Please be accurate to avoid any confusion.
Below you can browse credit transactions history of this user, you can filer transactions by type of credits(transfers, spent credits) and activity type(uploading photo, video, liking, etc).
Below you can browse credit transactions per user, type of credits(transfers, spent credits) and activity type(uploading photo, video, liking, etc).

Here you can control all settings of credits, you can edit how many credits member can earn doing various activities within some period.

`Credit` - set the number of credits which member can earn by doing this activity. Set it 0(zero) if you don't want members to earn credits doing this activity and this activity won't be displayed in FAQ section for members;

`Max` - set the maximum number of credits which member can earn by doing this activity within Rollover Period;

`Rollover Period` - is a period within Max number of credits restriction is applied. Set it 0(zero) if you would like to apply Max number of credits to forever;

This form allows to you send credits to many members by member level, networks, or by selected members. For example, send 100 credits to all members from North America network.

Also you can set this number of credits as a current balance. For example, set 500 credits to all members from Moderators member level.

pagetitle-credit-index-index: Set default credits to users witch chose
Credits: Set this number of credits as current balance

pagetitle-credit-index-index: How much do you want to give this users
Credits: How much do you want to give this users

pagetitle-credit-index-index: Sending mass message to chose users
Credits: Sending mass message to the selected members

Hello,
We have gifted credits for you. Please check your current credits balance at Credits section. Thank you for being with us.
Site Administration

You can sell virtual credits to your members so they can buy using their credit card or PayPal account. You need to set up PayPal or 2Checkout settings to receive payments: Payment Gateways
You can sell credit packets, you can set price and provide some discounts for a large packages - it automatically detects discounts and displays it accordingly.
Here you can view detailed statistics for earned, spent, transferred and purchased credits per period(this year, this month, this week), etc. Please use the form below to filter statistics.

If you would like to provide get Badges feature which allows to you to intend members to get more credits to get appropriate Badges(Newbie, Officer, Silver Member, etc) then you to have Badges plugin. Badges plugin provides many other great features which increase interaction on your like Credits plugin, please check full detail here - Badges plugin.
If you have disabled Badges plugin then please enable to integrate it with Credits plugin.

This is the email that gets sent to a member when his payment for a credit packer is failed.

[header]

Your payment to [credit_title] credit is failed.

Please follow the link below to try again.

[object_link]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to a member when his payment for a credit packer is completed successfully

[header]

Thank you for purchasing from [credit_title] credit. Your payment has been completed successfully.

[object_link]

[footer]
Credits are a virtual currency you can use to send virtual gifts to friends and purchase goods at Store.

You can earn credits doing various activities on the site, like referring friends, playing quizzes, uploading photos, posting messages, participating in events, etc. Also you can purchase credits using credit card or PayPal account.
You can use Credits to send virtual gifts to your friends on birthday, Christmas, etc. Also you can purchase goods at Store.
Credits are a secure virtual currency. It is not needed to share any your financial information on our site.

You can set up Ranks(Badges) given to members when they reach some number of credits: 100 credits to get Bronze Member rank, 200 credits to get Silver Member rank, etc.
Please check set up ranks here - Credit Ranks.

Please set here your Credits Exchange Rate which is used to automatically calculate store products costs in credits. Of course if you have Store plugin and products are configured to be sold for credits. This rate doesn't affect your credits packages(Sell Credits section), where you can create any credits package at any price.

Please be accurate while changing this setting. It is not recommened to change it frequently because may cause members confusion. Please carefully select this rate depending on how many credits are given to members for their activity. It is recommended to have it high as 100 credits for %s
